title: Random Leaverbuster ban
body: I got a ban yesterday due to the server condition and Riot helped out really fast. Today I logged on and had a random leaverbuster ban after the client updated. Can you guys help me out? I also submitted another ticket comment. Thanks guys!

replies.body: I'm not currently seeing a Leaverbuster on your account, so it looks like you may have gotten this taken care of already! Hit me back up of course if you still need any of though ^_^!
The client crashed after the champ select and mid-switchover. I got a leaverbuster even though I tried to exit and reconnect. (my team had already chosen remake) Can you help me out?
